channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flytipped mattress on Woodmill Road, 20th December
item.description:
A mattress dumped on the pavement on Woodmill Road. Pushed back to verge so people can pass.

item.title: Street cleansing, 20th December
item.description:
There are piles of leaves and tree debris in the road all the way up and pavements with slippery and mushy leaves. Looking at the website and dates for street cleansing it says that Homefield Road should have weekly street sweeping which doesn’t appear to take place and the road was schedule for cleaning in December on the 16th but that has also just to happen. Could the road please have a good clean please.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Homefield Road, Widmore, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two more pallets, 20th December
item.description:
175-185 New Kent Road. Find out which business dumps them and then you wouldn’t have to remove several pallets per week.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 177, New Kent Road, Walworth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Severe litter and rubbish in the front yard of 35 Navarino Road for 2 months, 20th December
item.description:
There has been a pile up of litter and rubbish in the front yard of 35 Navarino Road continuously for the past 2 months. The situation has not changed over 2 months at all.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Richmond Road, Hackney, London

item.title: David Copperfield park - plants, 20th December
item.description:
This park was created about a decade ago. A large sum of s106 money was devoted to appointing a garden designer. The original planting was spectacular. In the intervening period the plants have mostly died and not been replaced. They are haphazardly attacked by the parks department and the whole park is such a shame. Please dig out the original planting scheme and replace the missing plants. Thank you!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Kent Road, Elephant and Castle, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
